response.overview: Whitney Wright is still at home getting ready to go to work and her boss Angela White is already impatient. They've had a breakthrough with the trials for a new pill, she calls Angela immediately. Angela suggests she put her money where her mouth is and try the pill herself. Whitney starts feeling the effects and Angela is prepared to take full advantage. Sydney Cole is late for work again and knows her boss Chanel Preston will be upset. When she gets to work, Chanel is already on the phone yelling at someone. Things are not looking good. Chanel takes off her skirt and motions for her to eat her pussy. Sinn Sage is on the phone selling some stocks and she's stressed out. When she notices that her employees Karlee Grey and Penny Pax didn't finish the required tasks, she calls out their names but there's no answer. Sinn catches them eating out their pussies and offers them an ultimatum: get her off or get out.
response.title: Lady Boss Vol. 2
